newsitem.title: USA: Transaction Systems adds Lebanon network.
newsitem.headline: Transaction Systems adds Lebanon network.

text.p: Applied Communications Inc, a subsidiary of Transaction Systems Architects Inc, said Tuesday it added Interbank Payment Network SAL of Beirut, Lebanon to its base of more than 500 customers worldwide.

It said Interbank Payment Network has licensed Applied Communications' BASE24-atm software to operate a shared Automatic Teller Network for Interbank's founding banks and other financial institutions in Lebanon.

Four major banks in Lebanon - Banque du Liban et d'Outre Mer, Banque Audi, Fransabank and Credit Libanais - formed the Interbank Payment Network Co to implement and operate a payment network to connect ATMs of banks operating in Lebanon.
